query.name: create
query.sql: insert into site_event_definition_crf (site_event_definition_crf_id, event_definition_crf_id, study_id, update_id, date_updated, required_crf, double_entry, default_version_id, electronic_signature, hide_crf, selected_version_ids, source_data_verification_code) values (?,?,?,?,sysdate,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

query.name: update
query.sql: update site_event_definition_crf set event_definition_crf_id=?, study_id=?, update_id=?, date_updated=?, required_crf=?, double_entry=?, default_version_id=?, electronic_signature=?, hide_crf=?, selected_version_ids=?, source_data_verification_code=? where site_event_definition_crf_id=?

query.name: findBySiteIdAndEventDefinitionCRFId
query.sql: select * from site_event_definition_crf sedc where sedc.study_id = ? and sedc.event_definition_crf_id = ?

query.name: findAllBySiteIdAndStudyEventDefinitionId
query.sql: select * from site_event_definition_crf sedc, event_definition_crf edc where sedc.study_id = ? and edc.study_event_definition_id = ? and sedc.event_definition_crf_id = edc.event_definition_crf_id
